user.invalidEmailOrId: Invalid user ID or email address.
user.passwordResetEmailSent: An email with password reset instructions has been sent.
user.passwordMustBeString: A password must be a valid string of characters.
user.passwordTooLong: The password entered is too long.
user.passwordTooShort: The password entered is too short.
user.securityAnswerMustBeString: A security question answer must be a valid string of characters.
user.securityAnswerTooLong: The security question answer entered is too long
user.securityAnswerTooShort: The security question answer entered is too short
user.defaultSecurityQuestion: Who is your favorite fictional character?
user.tooManyFailedLoginAttempts: Your account has been deactivated due to too many failed login attempts.
user.tooManyFailedPasswordAttempts: Your account has been deactivated due to too many failed password attempts.
user.tooManyFailedPasswordResetAttempts: Your account has been deactivated due to too many failed password reset attempts.
user.tooManyFailedSecurityAnswers: Your account has been deactivated due to too many failed security answer attempts.
user.updateDidNotReturnUser: The update user method did not return an error or a user object.

error.badRequest: Bad request, correct any incorrect information and try again.
error.permissionDeniedPurgeUser: You do not have permission to purge the specified user account.
error.forbiddenAttribute: Forbidden, you do not have permission to modify one or more attributes in your request.
error.forbidden: Forbidden, you do not have permission to access this data.
error.invalidUsernameEmailAddress: Username cannot be an email address.
error.notificationUrlUndefined: Cannot send notification because the SDL server is not setup to receive notifications.
error.notificationSdlServerUserUndefined: Cannot send notification because the SDL server is currently an orphan, it is not owned by a user.
error.notFound: No resource(s) found at this location.
error.sdlServerForbidden: Request to SDL server was forbidden, try a more permissive access token.
error.sdlServerInvalidAccessToken: The 3rd party SDL Server rejected the access token.
error.sdlServerInvalidUrl: URL is invalid, make sure it contains 'https://'.
error.sdlServerInvalidOrUnreachable: The 3rd party SDL server is currently unreachable or the URL is invalid.
error.unauthorized: Unauthorized, you require authentication to access this data.
error.unknownResource: One or more of the specified resource(s) are invalid or unknown.
